Festival of Legends.name: Melomania
Festival of Legends.text:
Each time you play a minion this turn,
add a random Shaman spell to your hand.
Festival of Legends.flavor: I once saw a horse that had watermelons for hair. It was a melon mane, ya?!

Festival of Legends.name: Through Fel and Flames
Festival of Legends.text: Give a minion Rush. Finale: And +1/+1.
Festival of Legends.flavor: It's a Fel spell, but also a FIRE spell.

Festival of Legends.name: Air Guitarist
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Durability.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Nailing that solo was a breeze.

Festival of Legends.name: Annoying Fan
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. It can't attack while this is alive.
Festival of Legends.flavor: No, Annoy-o-Tron, an air horn is not an instrument.

Festival of Legends.name: Breakdance
Festival of Legends.text: Return a friendly minion to your hand. Summon a Dancer with its stats and Rush.
Festival of Legends.flavor: "Commander! Uhh... I'm... Pretty sure we just got served? I'm not really trained for this."

Festival of Legends.name: Bunch of Bananas
Festival of Legends.text: Give a minion +1/+1. (3 Bananas left!)
Festival of Legends.flavor: This card has bananas (spelled: B-A-N-A-N-A-S).

Festival of Legends.name: Costumed Singer
Festival of Legends.text: At the end of your turn, draw a Secret.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Who knows which forgotten, washed-up, former C-list celebrity might be in there!

Festival of Legends.name: Crowd Surfer
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Deathrattle: Give ANY other minion +1/+1 and this Deathrattle.
Festival of Legends.flavor: I'm pretty sure it's the band that's supposed to be crowd surfing, but you do you little dude.
Festival of Legends.howToGetGold: Earnable after purchasing the Festival of Legends Tavern Pass.

Festival of Legends.name: Deafen
Festival of Legends.text: Silence a minion. Combo: Also deal $2 damage to it.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Hey, Volsat, we can't hear you. You're on mute.

Festival of Legends.name: Death Growl
Festival of Legends.text: Choose a minion. Spread its Deathrattle to adjacent minions.
Festival of Legends.flavor: GRRRRR I'M SO ANGRY BECAUSE I'M DEAD!

Festival of Legends.name: Fan Club
Festival of Legends.text: Restore #3 Health to all friendly characters.
Festival of Legends.flavor: "Well that was weird. Yeah, I just walked up to the president of the fan club, he blabbered on for like 10 minutes, and then gave me a bike voucher..."

Festival of Legends.name: Flowrider
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're Overloaded, Discover a spell from your deck.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Her music sounds a lot better underwater where you can't hear it at all.

Festival of Legends.name: Free Spirit
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Battlecry and Deathrattle: Your Hero Power gains 1 more Armor this game.
Festival of Legends.flavor: His soul was supposed to go to Ardenweald, but you can't chain a free spirit down.

Festival of Legends.name: Frequency Oscillator
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: The next Mech you play costs (1) less.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Our lawyer made us change the flavor text of this card so we wouldn't get sued.

Festival of Legends.name: Funnel Cake
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Restore #3 Health to a minion and its neighbors. For each one Overhealed, refresh a Mana Crystal.
Festival of Legends.flavor: After all this time…. I thought it'd be bigger!

Festival of Legends.name: Idol's Adoration
Festival of Legends.text: Your Hero Power costs (0). After you use it, lose 1 Durability.
Festival of Legends.flavor: That is a mic, not a door.

Festival of Legends.name: Mixtape
Festival of Legends.text: Discover a copy of a card your opponent played this game.
Festival of Legends.flavor: That tape has got poetry and clarinet on it, Garona. POETRY. AND CLARINET.

Festival of Legends.name: Peaceful Piper
Festival of Legends.text: Choose One - Draw a Beast; or Discover one.
Festival of Legends.flavor: "Is there anything worth more than peace and love on the planet Azeroth?"

Festival of Legends.name: Razorfen Rockstar
Festival of Legends.text:
After you gain Armor,
gain 2 more.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Quilboar feel Rock in their blood. And blood in their rocks.

Festival of Legends.name: Saxophone Soloist
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control no other minions, add a Saxophone Soloist to your hand.
Festival of Legends.flavor: He used to play to crowds of adoring Murlocs, but 20 years later all that's left is gigs at secluded clubs and regrets. Where did all the time go? His dreams of fame and fortune, snuffed out like the flame of a small candle in a dimly lit bar. Nothing but

Festival of Legends.name: Synthesize
Festival of Legends.text:
Add a random 1, 2,
and 3-Cost Elemental to_your hand.
Festival of Legends.flavor: After the invention of elemental audio processing, Azeroth went through a major synth phase.

Festival of Legends.name: Taste of Chaos
Festival of Legends.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Finale: Discover a Fel spell.
Festival of Legends.flavor: It's spicy!

Festival of Legends.name: Thornmantle Musician
Festival of Legends.text: Finale: The next Beast you summon gets +1/+1.
Festival of Legends.flavor: She calls the hyena her "little chef". Not sure what that's about.

Festival of Legends.name: Verse Riff
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Gain 2 Armor. Finale: Play your last Riff.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Well anyways, here's Worgen Wall.

Festival of Legends.name: Void Virtuoso
Festival of Legends.text: During your turn, your hero is Immune.
Festival of Legends.flavor: That is one interesting dress code.
Festival of Legends.howToGetSignature: Earnable in Legends Take the Stage special event.

Festival of Legends.name: Arrow Smith
Festival of Legends.text:
[x]After you cast a spell,
deal 1 damage to the
lowest Health enemy.
Festival of Legends.flavor: "What do you mean it's a violin bow!?!"

Festival of Legends.name: Audio Amplifier
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: Set your maximum Mana and hand size to 11.
Festival of Legends.flavor: And you thought we were putting Wildheart Guff in Core. We'd never do that! WINK WINK.
Festival of Legends.howToGetGold: Earnable on the Festival of Legends Reward Track.

Festival of Legends.name: Audio Medic
Festival of Legends.text: Rush Finale: Gain Lifesteal.
Festival of Legends.flavor: His performance isn't over, watch!

Festival of Legends.name: Audio Splitter
Festival of Legends.text: Deathrattle: Copy the highest Cost spell in your hand.
Festival of Legends.flavor: "I tried to give him some constructive criticism but gosh, he really hates feedback!"

Festival of Legends.name: Baritone Imp
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Battlecry: Take Fatigue damage. Gain that much Attack and Health.@[x]Battlecry: Take {0} Fatigue damage. Gain that much Attack and Health.
Festival of Legends.flavor: He used to be an epic sax guy, but now he's just a common.

Festival of Legends.name: Barrel of Monkeys
Festival of Legends.text: Summon a 1/4 Monkey with Taunt. (3 Monkeys left!)
Festival of Legends.flavor: There used to be four monkeys, but then one fell off and bumped his head.

Festival of Legends.name: Cold Feet
Festival of Legends.text:
Enemy minions cost
(5) more next turn.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Looks like some of the dancers still need to warm up.

Festival of Legends.name: Cosmic Keyboard
Festival of Legends.text:
[x]After you cast a spell,
summon an Elemental with
stats equal to its Cost.
Lose 1 Durability.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Mine is signed by Algalon himself.

Festival of Legends.name: Crescendo
Festival of Legends.text:
[x]Take Fatigue damage.
Deal that much damage
to all enemies.@[x]Take {0} Fatigue damage.
Deal that much damage
to all enemies.
Festival of Legends.flavor: The more you flail your arms, the better the orchestra plays! Yup, that's definitely how it works.

Festival of Legends.name: Dance Floor
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Give your minions Rush.
Festival of Legends.flavor: I don't think Rush would ever be here.

Festival of Legends.name: Dead Air
Festival of Legends.text: Destroy your Undead. Resummon them.
Festival of Legends.flavor: We'll be right back after a word from our specters.

Festival of Legends.name: Disc Jockey
Festival of Legends.text: Combo: Add a random Combo card to your hand.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Hype coefficient insufficient.

Festival of Legends.name: Dreamboat
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: Restore #3 Health to all other friendly minions. Gain +1/+1 for each one Overhealed.
Festival of Legends.flavor: As the only member that can sing underwater, Paz saved Poison Bloom's Zin-Azshari tour from failure.

Festival of Legends.name: Eye of Shadow
Festival of Legends.text: Your hero has Lifesteal.
Festival of Legends.flavor: It's hard to makeup flavor text sometimes.

Festival of Legends.name: Fanboy
Festival of Legends.flavor: His name? Stan.

Festival of Legends.name: Felstring Harp
Festival of Legends.text:
[x]Whenever your hero would
take damage on your turn,
restore 2 Health instead.
Lose 1 Durability.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Playing it will singe your fingers and wither your soul, but at least it never needs restringing!

Festival of Legends.name: Groovy Cat
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Your Hero Power gives your hero 1 more Attack this game.
Festival of Legends.flavor: "Like, what if we're all just cards living in this box called Hearthstone, man?"

Festival of Legends.name: Harmonic Hip Hop
Festival of Legends.text: Deal $1 damage. Give your weapon +3 Attack. (Swaps each turn.)
Festival of Legends.flavor: I can name four things that rhyme with 'orange': Four inch, Door hinge, Syringe, and uh… Shmorange.

Festival of Legends.name: Harmonic Mood
Festival of Legends.text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Gain 4 Armor. (Swaps each turn.)
Festival of Legends.flavor: ROYGBive your hero +2 Attack this turn.

Festival of Legends.name: Hidden Meaning
Festival of Legends.text: Secret: When your opponent ends their turn with no Mana, summon a random 3-Cost minion.
Festival of Legends.flavor: I'm telling you, if you play the song backwards at triple speed I SWEAR Mukla sings about the Burning Legion.

Festival of Legends.name: Hipster
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell from your opponent's class that isn't in their deck.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Oh, so you like Hearthstone? Name every spell.
Festival of Legends.howToGetSignature: Earnable after purchasing the Festival of Legends Tavern Pass.

Festival of Legends.name: Infinitize the Maxitude
Festival of Legends.text: Discover a spell. Reduce its Cost by (1). Finale: Return this to your hand at end of turn.
Festival of Legends.flavor: When your music is instrumental, it doesn't matter if the words make no sense.

Festival of Legends.name: Instrument Tech
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: Draw a weapon.
Festival of Legends.flavor: A tech card without Tradeable? CRINGE.

Festival of Legends.name: Jam Session
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Give a friendly minion +3/+3. Deal $1 damage to all other minions. Overload: (1)
Festival of Legends.flavor: Their skills will make you jelly.

Festival of Legends.name: Jukebox Totem
Festival of Legends.text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
summon a 1/1 Silver
Hand Recruit.
Festival of Legends.flavor: If you really love Hearthstone, put another coin in the Totem baby!

Festival of Legends.name: Mosh Pit
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Spend 3 Corpses to give a friendly minion Reborn.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Let the Corpses hit the floor!

Festival of Legends.name: One Hit Wonder
Festival of Legends.text: Rush Combo: Gain Poisonous.
Festival of Legends.flavor: They're trying to get a second hit in with their next single, "Divine Shield".

Festival of Legends.name: Party Animal
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Battlecry: Give +1/+1 to a minion of each type in your hand.
Festival of Legends.flavor: He's the wildlife of the party!
Festival of Legends.howToGetGold: Earnable on the Festival of Legends Reward Track.

Festival of Legends.name: Popular Pixie
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Choose One - Refresh your Hero Power; or Your next one costs (0).
Festival of Legends.flavor: Popular Pixie personally prefers particularly powerful pop performances.

Festival of Legends.name: Power Chord: Synchronize
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Choose a minion. Add a copy of it to your hand. Finale: Give both +1/+2.
Festival of Legends.flavor:
"It's all about you, girl
On your 16,000th birthday"

Festival of Legends.name: Remixed Tuning Fork
Festival of Legends.text:
Gains an extra effect in
your hand that changes
each turn.
Festival of Legends.flavor: You can tune a fork, but you can't tune a fish.

Festival of Legends.name: Rewind
Festival of Legends.text: Discover a copy of another spell you've cast this game.
Festival of Legends.flavor: If you don't find the spell you want, just cast this one more time and see if you get lucky.

Festival of Legends.name: Roaring Applause
Festival of Legends.text:
Draw a card.
Repeat for each minion type you control.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Please clap.

Festival of Legends.name: Rolling Stone
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Rush Battlecry: If the last card you played costs (1), gain +1/+1.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Sadly, the mariachi band it used to play in gathers no más.

Festival of Legends.name: SECURITY!!
Festival of Legends.text: Summon two 1/1 Illidari with Rush. Outcast: Summon one more.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Check all of the boxes that contain VENGEANCE to play this card.

Festival of Legends.name: Snakebite
Festival of Legends.text: Rush Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each minion that died this turn.@ (@)
Festival of Legends.flavor: Don't look her in the eyes or you'll turn to ROCK!
Festival of Legends.howToGetSignature: Earnable after purchasing the Festival of Legends Tavern Pass.

Festival of Legends.name: Spotlight
Festival of Legends.text: Tradeable Convert a friendly Divine_Shield into a 5/5 Elemental.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Everyone's eyes are on you! Well, they're also looking at the giant Elemental that we're using as a spotlight, but mainly at you!

Festival of Legends.name: Stereo Totem
Festival of Legends.text: At the end of your turn, give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Pass the ox cord!
Festival of Legends.howToGetGold: Earnable on the Festival of Legends Reward Track.

Festival of Legends.name: Arcanite Ripper
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a @/@ Lifesteal Undead. (Change your Health on your turn while equipped to improve!)
Festival of Legends.flavor: A guitar with a skull - perfect for headbanging.

Festival of Legends.name: Beatboxer
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Combo: Deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Festival of Legends.flavor: "ERROR. CANNOT COMPUTE 'NO PUNCHING ALLOWED DURING MUSICAL PERFORMANCE'."

Festival of Legends.name: Boogie Down
Festival of Legends.text: Summon two 1-Cost minions from your deck. Finale: Give them Taunt.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Whatever you do, do NOT sashay to the right.

Festival of Legends.name: Bounce Around (ft. Garona)
Festival of Legends.text: Return all friendly minions to your hand. They cost (1) this turn.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Another one.

Festival of Legends.name: Chill Vibes
Festival of Legends.text: Restore #8 Health. Finale: Summon a 3/3 Elemental with Taunt.
Festival of Legends.flavor: "You're listening to 47.7 Shaman FM radio. It's time to kick back, relax, and take in the music."

Festival of Legends.name: Chorus Riff
Festival of Legends.text: Draw a minion. Give it +3/+3. Finale: Play your last Riff.
Festival of Legends.flavor: What do you mean, what do you mean, I SAY WHAT DO YOU MEEEEEAN, mean, mean, meaaaaaaan this chorus is repetitive?

Festival of Legends.name: Cowbell Soloist
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control no other minions, deal 2 damage.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Hot take: We need LESS cowbell. Much, much less.
Festival of Legends.howToGetSignature: Earnable in Legends Take the Stage special event.

Festival of Legends.name: Death Metal Knight
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Taunt Costs Health instead of Mana if your hero was healed this turn.
Festival of Legends.flavor: He prefers listening to bands dead rather than live.

Festival of Legends.name: Demonic Dynamics
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Discover 2 Demons. Finale: Give them +1/+2.
Festival of Legends.flavor: The Blue Imp Group sure knows how to put on a show!

Festival of Legends.name: Disco Maul
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +@/+@. (Play minions while equipped to improve!)
Festival of Legends.flavor: Nah, dis go face.

Festival of Legends.name: Festival Security
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Taunt Finale: Force all enemy minions to attack this.
Festival of Legends.flavor: "Incident in the mosh pit? Copy that, be there in a year."
Festival of Legends.howToGetGold: Earnable on the Festival of Legends Reward Track.

Festival of Legends.name: Fiddlefire Imp
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: Add a random Fire Mage and Fire Warlock spell to your hand.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Most find the stages set aflame by the Grimtotem too dangerous to perform on, but to him they're perfect!

Festival of Legends.name: Funkfin
Festival of Legends.text: Divine Shield Your minions with Divine Shield have +2_Attack.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Shake your groove fin!

Festival of Legends.name: Hardcore Cultist
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. Finale: To all enemies.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Thumb in = devil horns. Thumb out = I love you. A VERY important distinction when you're at a metal concert.

Festival of Legends.name: Harmonic Metal
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Give 4 random minions in your hand +2/+2. (Swaps each turn.)
Festival of Legends.flavor: I have bashed together plenty of pieces of metal in my day and not ONCE has it sounded harmonic.

Festival of Legends.name: Harmonica Soloist
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: If you control no other minions, Discover and cast a Secret.
Festival of Legends.flavor: A magician never reveals their Secrets. A musician on the other hand...

Festival of Legends.name: Heartthrob
Festival of Legends.text: Overheal: Summon a random minion with Cost equal to the amount Overhealed.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Oh no, Harth! Look out! He's here to rob you!
Festival of Legends.howToGetSignature: Earnable after purchasing the Festival of Legends Tavern Pass.

Festival of Legends.name: Holotechnician
Festival of Legends.text:
After ANY minion takes exactly 1 damage,
destroy it.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Ironically, operating the spotlight comes with very little recognition.

Festival of Legends.name: Jazz Bass
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Deathrattle: Your next spell costs (@) less. (Overload while equipped to improve!)
Festival of Legends.flavor: No birds, plural, were harmed in the making of this bass.

Festival of Legends.name: Lightshow
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Shoot two beams at enemies that deal $2 damage. Shoot one more for each Lightshow you've cast this game.@ (@)
Festival of Legends.flavor: Always remember P.L.U.R.: Peace, Laser-beams, Unity, Respect.

Festival of Legends.name: Love Everlasting
Festival of Legends.text: Your first spell each turn costs (2) less. Lasts until you don't play a spell on your turn.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Poison Bloom was accused of plagiarizing the "Ooh, how long can this go on (ooh yeah)" hook from an old-school musical group called The Saronite Chain Gang.

Festival of Legends.name: Metrognome
Festival of Legends.text: [x]After you play a {0}-Cost card, draw a {1}-Cost card. (Then increase!)
Festival of Legends.flavor: He's very popular on Click-Clock.

Festival of Legends.name: Mic Drop
Festival of Legends.text: Draw 2 cards. Finale: Give your weapon +2 Attack.
Festival of Legends.flavor: The perfect card to play after emoting.

Festival of Legends.name: Outfit Tailor
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Attack and Health equal to this minion's.
Festival of Legends.flavor: She has this terrible habit of eating melted cheese while on the job.

Festival of Legends.name: Paparazzi
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: Discover a Legendary minion.
Festival of Legends.flavor: When you're a Legendary minion, you get a shiny orange gem, a dragon emblem, and about 100 of these people following you everywhere.

Festival of Legends.name: Photographer Fizzle
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Battlecry: Take a Snapshot of your current hand and shuffle it into your deck.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Look at this photograph.

Festival of Legends.name: Plagiarizarrr
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: Get a copy of the top card of your opponent's deck.
Festival of Legends.flavor: He's also working on his own Hearthstone expansion: Festival of Epics.

Festival of Legends.name: Power Slider
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Rush Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each minion type you've played this game.@ (@)
Festival of Legends.flavor: There's a huge difference between a battle-axe and an axe-guitar. One is for combat, and the other is for combat AND rocking out.

Festival of Legends.name: Record Scratcher
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Deathrattle: Refresh @ Mana |4(Crystal, Crystals). (Play Combo cards while ____equipped to improve!)__
Festival of Legends.flavor: A Rogue's favorite audio sample is an orchestral stab.

Festival of Legends.name: Remixed Dispense-o-bot
Festival of Legends.text: Gains an extra effect in your hand that changes each turn.
Festival of Legends.flavor:
"Mine gave me free money!"
"Mine gave me free ice cream!"
"… mine gave me two sheep that explode. They were free but I still want a refund."

Festival of Legends.name: Remixed Musician
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Rush Gains an extra effect in your hand that changes each turn.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Like every bard I know, he's a chaotic Neutral jack of all trades.

Festival of Legends.name: Remixed Totemcarver
Festival of Legends.text: Gains an extra effect in your hand that changes each turn.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Music always sounds better on old, wooden speakers.

Festival of Legends.name: Reverberations
Festival of Legends.text: Summon a copy of a minion. Each one dies after taking damage.
Festival of Legends.flavor: This sounds much louder in the void.

Festival of Legends.name: Rhyme Spinner
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Rush Combo: Gain +1/+1 for each other Combo card you've played this game.@ (@)
Festival of Legends.flavor: For ONCE we're not talking about ice!

Festival of Legends.name: Rock Master Voone
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Battlecry: Copy a minion of each minion type in your hand.
Festival of Legends.flavor: After several audience members were burnt to a crisp, Voone's band became a lot less all-in on Dragons.
Festival of Legends.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in Festival of Legends card packs.

Festival of Legends.name: Rowdy Fan
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. It has +3 Attack while this is alive.
Festival of Legends.flavor: "This song is so good, it makes me want to PUNCH SOMEONE IN THE FACE!!"

Festival of Legends.name: Rush the Stage
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Draw two Rush minions. They cost (1) less.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Left Shark, get to the stage now!

Festival of Legends.name: Shadow Chord: Distort
Festival of Legends.text:
Give a minion -5/-5.
If it has 0 Attack, destroy it.
Festival of Legends.flavor: For some unknown reason, using distortion intentionally in your music will attract hundreds of geckos to your location.

Festival of Legends.name: Starlight Groove
Festival of Legends.text: Give your hero Divine Shield. For the rest of the game, playing a Holy spell refreshes it.
Festival of Legends.flavor: In space, no one can hear you groove.

Festival of Legends.name: Static Waveform
Festival of Legends.text: At the start of EACH turn, lose 1 Attack or Health (chosen randomly).
Festival of Legends.flavor: LET ME SEE YOU MAKE SOME NOISE!!!

Festival of Legends.name: Tough Crowd
Festival of Legends.text: Outcast: Return a minion to its owner's hand.
Festival of Legends.flavor: "Your music's bad and you should feel bad."

Festival of Legends.name: Worgen Roadie
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 0/3 Instrument Case for your opponent. (Break it for a random weapon!)
Festival of Legends.flavor: "I asked for an instrument, and you give me a CURSED BLADE!?"
Festival of Legends.howToGetGold: Earnable on the Festival of Legends Reward Track.

Festival of Legends.name: Ambient Lightspawn
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Finale and Overheal: Give another random friendly minion +2/+2.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Make sure it's smaller than your other lightspawns for the best fill lighting.

Festival of Legends.name: Backstage Bouncer
Festival of Legends.text: Taunt Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a copy of this.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Doesn't see your name on the list. Also doesn't know how to read the names on the list.

Festival of Legends.name: Brass Elemental
Festival of Legends.text: Rush, Divine Shield, Taunt, Windfury
Festival of Legends.flavor: You handle the water spells. It's got the earth, wind, and fire covered.

Festival of Legends.name: Candleraiser
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Divine Shield Finale: Give adjacent minions Divine Shield.
Festival of Legends.flavor:
You would not believe your eyes
If ten million kobold guys
Lit up the world to this ogre beat

Festival of Legends.name: Cool Ghoul
Festival of Legends.text: Divine Shield Reborn
Festival of Legends.flavor:
He has disco fever! :D
Because of the disco plague. :(

Festival of Legends.name: Cover Artist
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: Transform into a 3/3 copy of a minion.
Festival of Legends.flavor: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on our fear of you realizing we copied this flavor text.

Festival of Legends.name: Crazed Conductor
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Battlecry: Take Fatigue damage. Summon that many 3/3 Imps.@[x]Battlecry: Take {0} Fatigue damage. Summon that many 3/3 Imps.
Festival of Legends.flavor: "The Twisting Nether is singing to me… WHAT IS THAT MELODY!?"

Festival of Legends.name: E.T.C., Band Manager
Festival of Legends.text: [x]While building your deck, assemble a band of 3 cards. _Battlecry: Discover one!
Festival of Legends.flavor: "This next band features the one and only M.C. Tech on the drums, the fungal king of the keyboard Loatheb, and the showstopping vocal chops of Spellbreaker!"
Festival of Legends.howToGet: Earnable after opening a Festival of Legends card pack.
Festival of Legends.howToGetDiamond: Obtained by purchasing the Diamond E.T.C., Band Manager card.

Festival of Legends.name: Fight Over Me
Festival of Legends.text:
Choose two enemy minions. They fight!
Add copies of any that
die to your hand.
Festival of Legends.flavor: And you thought the battles between the Alliance and Horde got ugly…

Festival of Legends.name: Freebird
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Charge Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other Freebird you've played this game.@ (@)
Festival of Legends.flavor: Free!? But it costs Mana!

Festival of Legends.name: Glaivetar
Festival of Legends.text: [x]_Deathrattle: Draw @ |4(card, cards)._ (Play Outcast cards while _equipped to improve!)
Festival of Legends.flavor: Might need tuning, I think it's a bit sharp.

Festival of Legends.name: Grimtotem Buzzkill
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: Discard a weapon to draw 3 cards.
Festival of Legends.flavor: I'd be mad too if you called me a 'buzzkill'.

Festival of Legends.name: Halveria Darkraven
Festival of Legends.text: Rush After a friendly Rush minion attacks, give your minions +1_Attack.
Festival of Legends.flavor: You know someone's cool when their name sounds like a font.
Festival of Legends.howToGetDiamond: Obtained by owning 27 Festival of Legends Legendary cards.

Festival of Legends.name: Heartbreaker Hedanis
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to this minion. Overheal: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Hedanis has won over the hearts and minds of millions of fans all over Azeroth! Shadow magic had nothing to do with it - not that you asked or anything.
Festival of Legends.howToGetDiamond: Earnable after purchasing the Festival of Legends Tavern Pass.

Festival of Legends.name: Instrument Smasher
Festival of Legends.text:
[x]Whenever your weapon is
destroyed, equip a random
Demon Hunter weapon.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Guitar? Nah, she plays percussion.

Festival of Legends.name: Jitterbug
Festival of Legends.text: Divine Shield After a friendly character loses_Divine Shield, draw a card.
Festival of Legends.flavor: The only bug that was intentional.

Festival of Legends.name: Jungle Jammer
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a random @-Cost Beast. (Cast spells while ____equipped to improve!)__
Festival of Legends.flavor: When asked what animal they would be, people always say things like "I'd be wolf-lion hybrid mix. King of the jungle, but still sociable and ferocious." No, you'd be a rat.

Festival of Legends.name: Keyboard Soloist
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control no other minions, summon two 1/2 Amps with Spell Damage +1.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Give her a hand, everybody! Or maybe 4!

Festival of Legends.name: Kodohide Drumkit
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal @ damage to all minions. (Gain Armor while ____equipped to improve!)__
Festival of Legends.flavor: Stolen from a druidic drum circle, now destined to make music that is actually good.

Festival of Legends.name: Merch Seller
Festival of Legends.text:
[x]At the end of your turn, put
a random spell on the top
_of your opponent's deck.
Festival of Legends.flavor: "Sorry, we're all out of Mediums. All we've got left are Gnome, Extra Large, and Annihilan."

Festival of Legends.name: Obsessive Fan
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. It has Stealth while this is alive.
Festival of Legends.flavor: "Obsessed? No! I'm just really really really really really really really really really really into E.T.C.'s music and everything he says, does, thinks, lives, and breathes!"

Festival of Legends.name: Pozzik, Audio Engineer
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: Add two 3/3 Bots to your opponent's hand. Deathrattle: Summon them for yourself.
Festival of Legends.flavor: "I'm down here, fixin' all the Gnomish tech that breaks down mid-set while that buffoon Fizzle is up there taking pictures of the sky. YOU tell ME who's the better engineer!"
Festival of Legends.howToGet: Earnable after collecting 30 Festival of Legends cards.

Festival of Legends.name: Pyrotechnician
Festival of Legends.text:
[x]After you cast a spell,
add a random Fire spell
to your hand.
Festival of Legends.flavor: The difference between a pyrotechnician and a pyromaniac is a paycheck.

Festival of Legends.name: Rhythm and Roots
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Choose One (Secretly) - Summon three 5/5 Ancients in 2 turns; or 8/8 Giants in 4 turns.
Festival of Legends.flavor: For Zok's latest song, he decided to go back to his roots. Like the ones on a tree. Tree roots.

Festival of Legends.name: Rhythmdancer Risa
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Rush After your hero attacks, return this to your hand and set its Cost to (1).
Festival of Legends.flavor:
Shadowstep to the left!
Double jump to the right!
Class cross!

Festival of Legends.name: Speaker Stomper
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (2) more next turn.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Just like in Hoofloose.

Festival of Legends.name: Spread the Word
Festival of Legends.text:
Draw 2 cards.
Costs (1) less for each Attack your hero has.

Festival of Legends.name: Timber Tambourine
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon @ 5/5 |4(Ancient, Ancients). (Play cards that cost (5) or more while __equipped to improve!)
Festival of Legends.flavor: Timberine anyone? TIMBERINE!?

Festival of Legends.name: Volume Up
Festival of Legends.text: Draw 3 spells. Finale: Discover a copy of one.
Festival of Legends.flavor: You have to pay Mana to do that!? I thought it was just in the settings menu!

Festival of Legends.name: Yelling Yodeler
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Battlecry: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle twice.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Maybe it's OK for the Grimtotem to destroy some music forever.

Festival of Legends.name: Altered Chord
Festival of Legends.text: Lifesteal Deal $6 damage to a minion. Costs (3) less if you're Overloaded.
Festival of Legends.flavor: I'll never understand how bands and orchestras allow musicians that just…. play... off-key. Would love opinions on this.

Festival of Legends.name: Big Dreams
Festival of Legends.text: Summon the highest Cost Beast from your hand. It goes Dormant for 2 turns.
Festival of Legends.flavor:
Just a small town Taunka
Livin' in a lonely... waunka

Festival of Legends.name: Blackrock 'n' Roll
Festival of Legends.text: Give all minions in your deck Attack and Health equal to their Cost.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Thank goodness it's not called Black-ska Mountain.

Festival of Legends.name: Blood Treant
Festival of Legends.text:
Costs Health instead
of Mana.
Festival of Legends.flavor: The blood of my enemies makes for some great fertilizer!

Festival of Legends.name: Boneshredder
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Battlecry: Spend 5 Corpses to trigger and gain the Deathrattle of a random friendly minion that died this game.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Is that his makeup or just his natural fur pattern?

Festival of Legends.name: Bridge Riff
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Summon a 3/4 Rocker with Taunt and a 4/3 with Rush. Finale: Play your last Riff.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Can be played in other places too.

Festival of Legends.name: Drum Soloist
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you control no other minions, gain +2/+2 and Rush.
Festival of Legends.flavor: "Was I rushin' or was I dragon?"

Festival of Legends.name: Elite Tauren Champion
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Finale: Start a ROCK DUEL! ___Players must spend all their___ Mana each turn or else they take 8 (or more) damage!
Festival of Legends.flavor: Strumming his guitar with a molten ember from the first fire of Azeroth, E.T.C.'s ear-splitting, heart-wrenching, head-banging solo held back Magatha and her forces of evil, single-handedly saving music for centuries to come.

Festival of Legends.name: Ghost Writer
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Finale: Discover another.
Festival of Legends.flavor: This eccentric scribe was cursed to an afterlife of never being recognized for his talents! Muahaha!
Festival of Legends.howToGetGold: Earnable on the Festival of Legends Reward Track.

Festival of Legends.name: Going Down Swinging
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Give your hero +2 Attack and Immune this turn, then attack each enemy minion.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Halveria was outcast from Gilneas for being too edgy, which she sees as an achievement.

Festival of Legends.name: Guitar Soloist
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control no other minions, draw a spell, a minion, and a weapon.
Festival of Legends.flavor: She is the hero of the guitar. The guitar hero. Trademark.

Festival of Legends.name: Harmonic Disco
Festival of Legends.text: Discover a 5-Cost minion. Summon it with +1/+1. (Swaps each turn.)
Festival of Legends.flavor: "Worry not, festival patrons! A disco is hardly any means for panic!"

Festival of Legends.name: Inzah
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Overload cards cost (1) less.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Inzah plays the trumpet, saxophone, piano, guitar, AND bass. No wonder he's always so overloaded!
Festival of Legends.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in Festival of Legends card packs.

Festival of Legends.name: JIVE, INSECT!
Festival of Legends.text: Transform a minion into Ragnaros the Firelord. Overload: (2)
Festival of Legends.flavor: "WHY IS NO ONE JIVING? I SPECIFICALLY REQUESTED IT!"

Festival of Legends.name: Kangor, Dancing King
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Lifesteal Deathrattle: Swap this with a minion from your hand and give it Lifesteal.
Festival of Legends.flavor: After Dr. Boom's involvement with the League of EVIL, Kangor cut ties with the Boomsday Labs and began pursuing his true passion - DISCO!!!
Festival of Legends.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in Festival of Legends card packs.

Festival of Legends.name: Magatha, Bane of Music
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: Draw 5 cards. Give any spells drawn to your opponent.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Not to be confused with that one other "-agatha" that likes when you play minions.
Festival of Legends.howToGetDiamond: Obtained by purchasing the Golden Audiopocalypse Mini-Set.

Festival of Legends.name: MC Blingtron
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Battlecry: Both players equip 1/2 Microphones. Your opponent's increases all damage they take by 1!
Festival of Legends.flavor: If this is the outcome of the robot uprising, then sign me up!
Festival of Legends.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in Festival of Legends card packs.

Festival of Legends.name: Opera Soloist
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: If you control no other minions, deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.
Festival of Legends.flavor: It ain't over until the imp mother sings.

Festival of Legends.name: Remixed Rhapsody
Festival of Legends.text:
Deal $3 damage
to all minions. Gains an extra effect in your hand that changes each turn.
Festival of Legends.flavor:
"Is this real life?"
"No, this is a card game."

Festival of Legends.name: Rin, Orchestrator of Doom
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Taunt. Deathrattle: Both players draw 2 cards, discard 2 cards, and destroy the top 2 cards of their deck.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Rin's orchestra is the best of the best. When your replacement is just one summoning away, you have to play perfectly.
Festival of Legends.howToGetDiamond: Obtained by purchasing the Diamond Rin, Orchestrator of Doom card.

Festival of Legends.name: Screaming Banshee
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Lifesteal _After your hero gains Health,_ summon a Soul with that _much Attack and Health.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Her singing will be sure to wake you up (wake you up inside).

Festival of Legends.name: Star Power
Festival of Legends.text:
[x]Deal $5 damage to a
random enemy minion.
Repeat this with 1
less damage.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Five of the spectators were star-struck.

Festival of Legends.name: Summer Flowerchild
Festival of Legends.text: [x]__Battlecry: Draw two cards__ that cost (6) or more. Finale: They cost (1) less.
Festival of Legends.flavor: "Ugh, those Winter Floweradults just don't get our music."

Festival of Legends.name: Symphony of Sins
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Discover and play a Movement. Shuffle the other 6 into your deck.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Makes for some killer final boss music.

Festival of Legends.name: Tony, King of Piracy
Festival of Legends.text: Both players' decks are swapped. Finale: Draw a card.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Tony prefers sailing on torrents rather than streams.
Festival of Legends.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in Festival of Legends card packs.

Festival of Legends.name: Dirge of Despair
Festival of Legends.text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to a
character. If that kills it,
summon a Demon from
your deck.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Oh, the misery!

Festival of Legends.name: Doomkin
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: Take one of your opponent's empty Mana_Crystals.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Now THIS is Mana cheating.

Festival of Legends.name: Harmonic Pop
Festival of Legends.text: Deal $3 damage to all minions. Summon a 6/6 Popstar. (Swaps each turn.)
Festival of Legends.flavor: Here with supporting vocals: Snap and Crackle!

Festival of Legends.name: Hollow Hound
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Lifesteal, Rush Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Uh oh, the hollow hound is coming out of its cage! Don't worry though, it's doing just fine.

Festival of Legends.name: Horn of the Windlord
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Windfury Whenever your hero attacks a minion, set its stats to 3/3.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Woodwinds! Obey my command!

Festival of Legends.name: Lead Dancer
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck with less Attack than this minion.
Festival of Legends.flavor:
"Follow my lead!"

*dies*

Festival of Legends.name: Mister Mukla
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Rush. Battlecry: Fill your opponent's hand with Bananas.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Music is Mukla's escape from his anger. When he's on-stage, it's like he's a whole different gorilla… Until you boo him.
Festival of Legends.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in Festival of Legends card packs.

Festival of Legends.name: Unpopular Has-Been
Festival of Legends.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 5-Cost minion from the past.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Oh man, she used to rock more than ANYONE back in the Year of the Kraken. I wish I could've seen her perform back then…

Festival of Legends.name: Abyssal Bassist
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal Costs (2) less for each weapon you've equipped this game.
Festival of Legends.flavor: DROP THE BASS (INTO THE ABYSS)!

Festival of Legends.name: Drum Circle
Festival of Legends.text: Choose One - Summon five 2/2 Treants; or Give your minions +2/+4 and Taunt.
Festival of Legends.flavor: It's more of a drum pentagon, really.

Festival of Legends.name: Pack the House
Festival of Legends.text: Summon a random 6, 5, 4, and 3-Cost minion. Overload: (2)
Festival of Legends.flavor: How many Pack the Houses would a pack house if a pack could house Pack the House?

Festival of Legends.name: The One-Amalgam Band
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain a random bonus effect for each minion type you've played this game.@ (@)
Festival of Legends.flavor: Why be good with ONE instrument when you can be terrible with ALL of them!!!
Festival of Legends.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in Festival of Legends card packs.

Festival of Legends.name: Zok Fogsnout
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two {0}/{1} Quilboar with Taunt. _(Improved by your hero Attack_ __& Armor gained this turn!)
Festival of Legends.flavor: Despite having only 3 digits on each hand, Zok plays Bass like he has 5.
Festival of Legends.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in Festival of Legends card packs.

Festival of Legends.name: Cage Head
Festival of Legends.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 9/9 Blight Boar with Charge and Taunt.
Festival of Legends.flavor: You get your head stuck in a cage ONCE, and all of a sudden you've got a new nickname.
Festival of Legends.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in Festival of Legends card packs.

Festival of Legends.name: Concert Promo-Drake
Festival of Legends.text: Tradeable Finale: Destroy an enemy minion.
Festival of Legends.flavor: There's a reason why it's promoting the festival instead of playing in it - it's a rhyme-lost protodrake.

Festival of Legends.name: Mish-Mash Mosher
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Rush After this attacks, gain +1 Attack and attack a _random enemy minion.
Festival of Legends.flavor: In the pit, he feels more alive than ever.
Festival of Legends.howToGetGold: Earnable on the Festival of Legends Reward Track.

Festival of Legends.name: Stranglethorn Heart
Festival of Legends.text: Tradeable Resurrect all friendly Beasts that cost (5) or more.
Festival of Legends.flavor: The Stranglethorn mentality is to be happy with the bare necessities.

Festival of Legends.name: Annoy-o-Troupe
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Taunt, Divine Shield Deathrattle: Summon three 1/2 Mechs with Taunt and Divine Shield.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Some classes get Void Lords, other classes get Annoyed Lords.

Festival of Legends.name: Amplified Elekk
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Before this show can continue, we have to bass-boost the elephant in the room.

Festival of Legends.name: Banjosaur
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Rush Whenever this attacks, draw a Beast and gain its stats.
Festival of Legends.flavor: You'll all be singing along once he gets to the tyranno-chorus.

Festival of Legends.name: Climactic Necrotic Explosion
Festival of Legends.text: [x]Lifesteal. Deal ${0} damage. Summon {1} {2}/{3} Souls. (Randomly improved by Corpses you've spent)
Festival of Legends.flavor: The less legible the band's logo, the more hardcore it is.

Festival of Legends.name: DJ Manastorm
Festival of Legends.text: Battlecry: Set the Cost of spells in your hand to (0). After you cast one, the others cost (1) more.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Do not sleep on his Tinker Town deep house set - absolutely legendary.
Festival of Legends.howToGetSignature: Obtainable in Festival of Legends card packs.

Festival of Legends.name: Fanottem, Lord of the Opera
Festival of Legends.text: Taunt, Lifesteal This card's Cost is equal to the amount of cards in your deck.
Festival of Legends.flavor: Writing a compelling symphony takes time. Usually around 20 turns or more.
